templatewizard-desc: A WikiEditor add-on that provides a template-insertion wizard
templatewizard-no-templatedata: [[Template:$1|$1]] can not be used in the Template Wizard because it doesn't have [$2 TemplateData] tags. Please fix that and try again. If you think you've found a bug tell us about it on the [$3 help page].
templatewizard-template-not-found: [[Template:$1|$1]] can not be used in the Template Wizard because it doesn't exist. Please create it (and its [$2 TemplateData]) and try again. If you think you've found a bug tell us about it on the [$3 help page].
